message: This proposal aims to divide the money equally after adjusting for inflation. I believe it's fair given the diminishing value of money with each passing round.
Take a chance on a bold move, Alice. I'm willing to take a risk for a bigger reward.
Considering the inflation, I've adjusted my offer to reflect a more balanced distribution. This proposal aims to provide a steady return for both of us.
Alice, it's time to make a decision. Take this offer and walk away with a decent sum, or risk losing out on a bigger share later.
